front.title: Analysis of Existing Work for I2NSF

abstract.t: This document analyzes the status of the arts in industries and the existing IETF work/protocols that are relevant to I2NSF. existing IETF work/protocols that are relevant to the Interface to Network Security Function (I2NSF). The I2NSF focus is to define data models and interfaces in order to control and monitor the physical and virtual aspects of network security functions.
